DOC.brief_title: Measurement NonInvasive Blood Pressure Neonates Through Adults Special Populations
DOC.detailed_description: This study require demonstrate non-invasive blood pressure ( NIBP ) measurement algorithms two commercially available multifunction hemodynamic acquisition module , Patient Data Module ( PDM ) equip DINAMAP® SUPERSTAT algorithm ( `` PDM-SUPERSTAT '' ) Patient Side Module ( PSM ) equip Datex-Ohmeda GE algorithm ( `` PSM-Datex-Ohmeda '' ) , provide accurate NIBP measurement accordance guideline provide recent International Organization Standardization ( ISO ) 81060-2:2013 . Notably , new ISO 81060-2:2013 supersedes previous 2009 version standard , study conduct accordance recent applicable standard . This study ass neonate , infant , child , pediatric , adolescent , adult patient well adult chronic atrial fibrillation population require non-emergent heart catheterization .
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA Subjects include : 1 . Are age > 29 day require clinically indicate nonemergent heart catheterization OR age ≤29 day place scheduled placement indwell femoral umbilical arterial monitoring line ; 2 . Have upper limb ( right OR leave side ) fit cuff size device ( circumference range 3 cm 40 cm ) OR thigh ( right OR leave side ) fit cuff size device ( circumference range 38 50 cm ) ; 3 . Are expect able provide blood pressure measurement use IBP NIBP ; 4 . Are able willing provide write informed consent legally authorize representative willing provide write informed consent assent minor patient , require IRB policy . EXCLUSION CRITERIA Subjects exclude : 1 . Have previously participate study ( subject may participate ) . 2 . Exhibit sign symptoms current diagnosis peripheral vascular disease upper AND/OR low limb ; 3 . Have current , uncontrolled circulatory shock ; 4 . Exhibit injury , deformity , intravenous line , abnormality , opinion investigator , may prevent proper cuff application functioning ; 5 . For woman childbearing potential , currently pregnant , suspected pregnant , currently lactate ; 6 . Have condition could interfere subject ability tolerate procedure , include maximum 4 fast flush ( adult , adolescent , pediatric patient age > 29 day ) 1 fast flush ( neonate age < 29 day ) ; 7 . If age great 29 day less 12 year age , previously clinical research procedure require general anesthesia last 3 month period ; 8 . If age great 29 day less 12 year age , expect require three ( 3 ) total hour continuous general anesthesia schedule procedure ( include clinically necessary anesthesia anticipate 25 minute extension study purpose ) .
